reviewText: I bought four Curious George DVDs for my two-year old grandson and he loves them! I love them because they are age appropriate, entertaining and they teach math and science concepts.

This is the fifth DVD we've bought from the Curious George series and it doesn't disappoint.
My son loves all the stories and we don't mind watching them with him over and over again.
Episodes are "Curious George Sinks the Pirates", "Up, Up and Away", "The Magic Garden", "Being Hundley", "Creatures of the Night", "Camping with Hundley", "All-New Hundley" and "Curious George and the Slithery Day".

Wait a second! These reviews are for the Curious George movie, which is ENTIRELY different from this DVD, a compilation of about eight shows from PBS kids. The difference? The shows are humorous, entertaining, and delightful! (and also very educational)The movie was NOT. Don't be confused- if you're looking for the movie, this isn't it. This is much better!
Always love George
6 year old loves these books
IS WAS EXPECTED

I have not been disappointed with any Curious George DVDs thus far. It is very educational and creates a lot of teachable moments with my child. It is as usual packed with episodes so it is money well spent.
My son loves curious george.  R his monkey is smart and teach my son alot first thing in the morning he asks  george. This monkey is a God sent. Love him
My children enjoy the Curious George episodes.
Excellent.  My grandkids love it.
Little kids love this movie.

I love Curious George but my 4 year old loves him even more. There are several episodes on the disc which will be great when we make the 12hour+ trip to Grandma's house this summer. This is going to be a Christmas present. Based on the pics on the back of the box, it looks just like that one on tv (same animation).
I buy a lot of Curious George my 2 grand sons love George. we have almost every DVD, and tons of George things.

Bought few Curious George DVDs for my 4 years old granddaughter and WE both been having our "glorious and wondrous" special time together watching them.  Educational with always a good lesson behind them besides that he is so lovable and cute. My granddaughter often sings the theme song everywhere she goes. Great value thanks.
This is a great DVD, my son loves to watch it. He loves to watch all of them that he has.

Its educational too. My 3 yr old loves the camping episode and has been pestering me to take him camping.
The episode on night creatures is great too. he learnt quite a bit about possums!

I am so sick of the programming on Disney Channel teaching my boy that if you want to get down from a tree you need a giant piece of celery to slide down.  We try and give our child other things to do, but the reality is that sometimes it is just more appropriate to let him watch some TV...if you can stand the agenda of the people making the programs.

Then we ran across Curious George and were relieved.  No agendas, no politically correct subject matter, no illogical logic.  The first time we watched one it was like taking your shoes off after a long walk on a summer day...aaahhhh.

To top it off, each DVD only costs around $10. I ended up buying 10 different titles and have been happy with every one...thus I will copy and paste this review on each one of them.

This is one happy dad who loves that annoying monkey.
bought it for a birthday present and our grandson watches it alot. I would say you can't go wrong with Curious George

George is an absolute favorite in our house! We own all the books and the stuffed George goes to bed every night.. Love all the episodes! This is exactly like the george episodes on TV. No complaints.
What a cute movie for pirate lovers/ George fans. My kids love the Curious George movies and show. This one is perfect for car trips.
It is PBS episodes on DVD.  Curious George is great.  It is both of my kids favorite cartoon.  It is educational and suitable for any age.

My 2 year old loves watching Curious George on pbs while at home.  We must have several dozen episodes recorded.  Now when we go on road trips, we are able to watch Curious George thanks to the dvds.  They are the same episodes you watch on tv. Each DVD contains 8 shows totaling over 90 minutes of pure entertainment for our child to watch.
My twin 3 year old granddaughters love Curious George.  This DVD was a good mix of stories and just the right amount of time spent in front of the TV.
Perfect for children who love Curious George and Pirates.  George is classic and good for all ages.  Video is well made.
Tons of George tons of fun.  Get it for your children.  Get all of them if you can.  They are cheaper seperately on Amazon then together from what I found.
Several short very typical Curious George stories: no surprises, short, easily understood.  Only one of the 'episodes' involves pirates.  Not my grandson's favorite DVD, but is ok.
My son could watch "monkey" all day long ... this video (along with all the curious george ones) are great.

My two year old likes to watch this one again and again, and the episodes are entertaining enough that I can watch them with here and enjoy them.  Watching George solve his problems, particularly through the used of colors and shapes and numbers, proves inspirational when viewed together; and I love to hear her laugh at his antics.  Highly recommended for Curious George lovers.

This DVD has such entertaining stories.  The stories are so much fun that children don't realize that they are learning something too.  My two year old loves George and my 11 year old loves him as well.  I have to admit that I enjoy watching them too.  This is good, clean, educational fun for children.

We own 10 George dvds.  This is my 3 year old's favorite one.  I'm very VERY picky about what my kids watch, so I was really excited to finally find something pirate-related that meets my approval.  Although it is just one episode, the "pirate one!" is the only one my son asks for anymore.  I like that they made TMWTYH (If you've watched George enough, surely you know what I mean: The Man With The Yellow Hat) be the (sort-of)villainous pirate - its hilarious how he keeps forgetting to  be rough and say "yarrrr!"  Another amazing addition to the Curious George series from PBS!

This was our fifth or sixth Curious George DVD purchase and we're still extremely happy with them every time.  Curious George is one of the only shows that our little one can watch and enjoy without causing everyone to want to flee the room!  So many shows for kids make adults grind their teeth at the thought of watching or hearing it one more time.  Not Curious George - they are funny and entertaining enough that our teenager will actually get caught up and giggle occasionally.

These episodes include Hundley the lobby dog along with George.
My daughter loves this movie!
She just does not care for the little skits by real children in the middle of the George episodes.
But all in all a great dvd!
You can't go wrong with a Curious George DVD! Both my 2 year old and 5 year old daughters love watching it!
Good book
You cannot go wrong with curious George good quality DVD also we recommend this product enjoy

We love George morning, noon and night.
These DVDs are a must see everyday in our household. Also they are very educational.
DVD plays great and my Grandson loves Curious George, another great DVD for his collection.
This is not a film with will ferrell like it says. Just regular cartoons.
Loved it!
Who doesn't love Curious George?
My daughters love this Curious George Pirate DVD.
grand kids love it
